name: Caramel Corn
author: Anna Bollinger
instructions: Keep popped corn warm in a shallow pan in a 250Â° oven. Com- bine margarine, brown sugar, molasses and salt in a saucepan and cook to a firm ball stage, 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in bak- ing soda. Pour syrup over popped corn, stirring well. Return corn to oven for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes. Cool and store in an air tight container.
